attributes.action: put disabled and buggy access into all flats in social housing
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: How many people wouldnt mind living in 1st, 2nd, 3rd or even 4th floor home if the block had lifts. This would mean there would be more housing for disabled people and not leave women stuck with young children stuck at home as they cant go out. We all moan there isnt enough social housing but I think if lifts were put into every block people would be more likely to live in these propertys that have become the "harder to let" properties.
